English: Qinqiang, an opera style popular in northwest China, possibly originating in Ming dynasty folk music

d.f: `一~`種~`流行~`於~`西北~`各省~`區~`的~`板腔體~`劇種~。`在~`同州梆子~`的~`基礎~`上~，`經過~`近~`百年~`的~`發展~`而~`成~　`為~`秦腔~。

English: Qinqiang, an opera style popular in northwest China, possibly originating in Ming dynasty folk music
